title: Case Analysis-Based Education for Learning About Hospital Adverse Events

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental understanding of healthcare systems and hospital operations
context.additional_context: Strengthening medical case analysis capabilities through the application of mathematical thinking

learning_goals: Learners can apply qualitative research methods to systematically analyze root causes of adverse events.
Learners can design strategies for utilizing a case database to propose a cross-hospital learning-sharing system.
Learners can optimize case analysis processes for quality improvement even under time constraints and work pressure.

resources: Virtual Hospital Adverse Event Case Database

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
